body_html:
And the line actually means
isinstance(initializer, type(tensorflow.python.ops.init_ops.Initializer))

If that's what it means, then please code it like that. And add a clarifying comment in code so nobody has to trace it back to this discussion (in case someone wants to read or change this code even again).

> isinstance(initializer, type(tensorflow.python.ops.init_ops.Initializer))

If that's what it means, then please code it like that. And add a clarifying comment in code so nobody has to trace it back to this discussion (in case someone wants to read or change this code even again).
